phrases: I understand it in my head, but why cannot I move?
I say I have no reason to win, but why is it so painful when I lose?
He is totally staring at me!
You became a professional shogi player in middle school.
I play baseball and hope to become a professional in the future.
I was not sure if I should rely on a baseball referral to enter a local high school,
or go to a rural school that has a chance at entering the national high school championship.
Then, my dad told me about you.
In this world, there are kids like this
who decided his own path in middle school and then became a professional.
If you want to become a professional, you need to be courageous and make a decision.
So I decided to go to a high school in Shikoku.
A coach who helped me at a junior tournament invited me there.
But I wanted to ask you.
Mr. Kiriyama, after becoming a professional, you went back to high school a year later.
This was a question that needed more than a superficial answer.
I really only specialize in shogi.
I am not really good at socializing.
I like studying, but I could not fit in at school.
I do not regret deciding on the direction of my life so early.
I think I wanted memories of not running away.
Why am I giving such a speech?
He is a middle school student whom I just met.
Only I will know my own memories of running away and slacking off.
But at critical moments, my coach often tells me to believe in myself.
But if you have even one memory of running away or slacking off,
you would think, But I slacked off that time after all.
but you wanted to get rid of things like that, right?
tears would stream down my face,
That is how happy I was.
Oh, but I wanted to talk a little more...
Um, if you do not mind, let us talk again.
You can get in touch with me through Hina... I mean Ms. Kawamoto.
I will call you soon, Kawamoto.
- Thank you, Hina! - Thank you, Kiriyama!
He is kind of a cool guy.
He is really got his act together.
So what did you two talk about?
I made salted rice balls out of all the rice.
There is also tempura, a boiled egg, pickled vegetables...
That night, the warm dinner and the various events of the day
I could not fall sleep easily...
Suddenly, the smell of the water and the sound of the waves
climbed up to my room on the sixth floor.
Just like how he asked me...
If a day comes when I am able to ask someone...
The scenery reflected in those eyes...
The stories that exist on the other side of the storm...
I still do not know the stories that are told on the other side of the goal.
YOU-Um... Maybe we should have dinner?
Right now, Hina is extremely nervous.
Normally she is energetic like a ball of light,
or get dejected like a dark cloud,
or angry like a bolt of lightning.
She is lively, in more ways than one.
I think of it as a good characteristic of hers.
But she is as stiff as a board.
And that is because in front of her,
Man, it is been a while since I have come here.
Hey, let us have curry already.
Do you think curry will be enough?
Maybe a fancier dinner would have been better.
It will not make him happy!
Received Messages From: Takahashi Title: It is Takahashi.
Mr. Kiriyama, are you free on Saturday?
I just got a message from Takahashi, asking if I am free on Saturday.
Can we both go to your house, Hina?
I feel kind of bad now, to get her so nervous.
Why are not you going to be home Saturday night, Sis?!
I asked him to eat dinner with us!
I was suddenly asked to work at the store on Saturday.
Why do not you make curry?
You can make it in advance and just warm it up when he gets here.
No worries about messing up either.
It has to be, let us see, fancier and more elaborate!
You have not learned your lesson at all, have you?
Have you forgotten about the bento already?
Look, when it comes to making dinner...
- Yeah Senpai, I totally heard it.
The dinner I am talking about is not your dinner...
Oh, I just said it twice!
Sis, are you making our dinner?
Meow Nom Nom Meroweow Delicious Crunch Crunch Mrawrawr
Okay, then how about deep-fried chicken as a topping bonus?
And what would you say to adding a hot spring egg on top of that?
There is a hot spring egg on top.
Thump Thump Thump Thump Thump Thump
He is eating it in such a delicious way.
The deep-fried chicken topping alone is great, but then hot spring egg, too?
It is like at a restaurant!
I wanted to ask Mr. Kiriyama something.
- Kawamoto, can I borrow your VCR?
- That is the guy who came over last time!
He is a person on TV?
He never said anything like that.
He is your best friend, right, Mr. Kiriyama?
H-How did it get to that?
Mr. Nikaidou often says that, in interviews and stuff.
Hey, why do not we save this video for next time?
You said you are in a shogi club, at school, right?
I did not know Mr. Kiriyama was keeping it a secret.
Thank you for letting me come over.
How is your old man and granddad?
They were playing shogi and fighting over it again last night.
So they wanted me to ask Kiriyama 5th-Dan a question.
I do not know if he went in for the kill or to be killed!
Now that is some passionate commentary!
My dad and grandpa said they did not think that was the losing move.
They wondered what Nikaidou 4th-Dan was going on about.
Dad and Grandpa did not think the move was that bad.
In fact, they said it felt like an aggressive move with manly spirit.
After my opponent surrounded me, he waited for me to make a mistake, and did not attack.
So I thought, All right, let us see if this is a mistake or not.
Do not try to act cool, Kiriyama!
If you really want to win, then persevere!
Do not just attack, you have to defend!
You have been acting a little weird lately!
Mr. Nikaidou, we cannot see the board!
You used to be more careful and single-minded back in the 3rd Dan league!
Bravery and recklessness are similar but different!
Nikaidou 4th-Dan, you are too close to the camera!
Take better care of your shogi, and yourself, Kiriyama!
Nikaidou 4th-Dan, they are playing on the 4th floor.
You got yourself a good friend there.
I am saying this as your best friend!
I am only going to say this once!
But it is kind of important.
In fact, get this on video so you can watch it over and over again!
Because you are not doing that, is the reason why you cannot progress!
Who the hell do you think you are?!
In the first place, what he is saying is crazy!
I am only going to say this once!
I am only going to say this once!
So record it and watch it over and over again!
So record it and watch it over and over again!
I do not understand it at all!
But I think Mr. Nikaidou's feelings for you as his best friend are genuine!
Wheee-ooo, you guys are sweet and sour!
There is hope for this generation yet!
This is the first time I have heard you raise your voice, Rei!
After all, nobody had ever said that to me before.
Would you please teach me how to play shogi?
Teach Me How to Play Shogi
Would you teach me how to play shogi?
If someone had interest in a world I was in,
I did not know it would make my stomach feel fluffy, and happy.
First, what kind of board should we go with?
A plastic mat would probably be better than a wooden board.
Since it will be used on the tea table in the living room.
And maybe we should use these plastic pieces, so they can handle it easily.
The characters are not in cursive, so it is easy to read.
And maybe we should have an illustrated guide, so it is easier to understand.
Let us see, which one would be good?
I recommend Taniyama and Senzaki for beginners, since they are easy to understand.
You sense the importance of spreading the word, too!
If it is okay with you, can I help?
You do not have to, but if you really wanted, I could totally help you!
So, who are you going to teach?
Looks like he lost from the pressure, passion, and many other things
I hope it will be okay.
I hope I can remember everything.
It looks difficult, but it is surprisingly simple to begin.
If you do feel that it is difficult, Hina, it will not be your fault.
The person who is teaching you is fully responsible.
It is my turn after a lead-in like that?
I will give you a simple explanation.
On top of this board with nine rows and nine columns, you and your opponent
both use 20 pieces with eight different types.
During the game, you take pieces and your pieces are taken,
but the main point is to capture your opponent's king.
The person who goes first is black, the second person is white,
and then you go back and forth.
Each of the eight different types of pieces has its own attributes and range of movement.
Incidentally, the columns are called files and the rows are called ranks.
The rows are marked with numerals.
And all of the boxes have an address.
Next, about the movement of each kind of piece...
Her expression says, Mmm, maybe this is difficult after all.
Hey, Hina, Momo would like some yogurt.
She will be so nervous, it will all go in one ear and out the other!
It will just be a waste.
You have to make the first impression easily understandable.
Drawn and Written by Harunobu Nikaidou
Okay, let us look at this picture book together.
Shogi is a game in which you use eight different types of personality and pieces
like this to capture your opponent's king.
You play on this board of 81 squares, 9 rows and 9 columns.
The three rows of pieces in front of you is your land.
The three rows on the other side are from your opponent's land.
Next I will introduce the personalities of each type of cat.
What is this feeling I have?
Teach Me How to Play Shogi

I will deliver you my meaty paw-punch meow!
